openGraph.title: Questions & Answers — Kaelis
openGraph.description: Answers to common questions about Kaelis: how to use the app, what Tarot, astrology, destiny matrix, and affirmations include.

item1.question: What is Kaelis AI and how is it different from other Tarot and astrology apps?
item1.answer: Kaelis AI is a self-discovery app that combines Tarot, natal chart, and destiny matrix. Unlike traditional apps, Kaelis uses artificial intelligence to provide personalized readings and astrological insights tailored to your question and life context.

item2.question: Can I get a free daily card online?
item2.answer: Yes, Kaelis AI offers a free Daily Card. Each day you can draw a personal Tarot card with an AI-powered interpretation — a quick insight to guide your day.

item3.question: How does the destiny matrix work in Kaelis AI?
item3.answer: The destiny matrix is calculated from your birth date and highlights strengths, life lessons, and karmic tasks. In Kaelis AI you get the numbers plus a clear, detailed interpretation.

item4.question: How can I build a natal chart?
item4.answer: Enter your birth date, time, and place — Kaelis AI automatically generates your natal chart with planets and houses, and provides a personalized interpretation in your preferred style.

item5.question: Does Kaelis AI provide relationship compatibility?
item5.answer: Yes. The Compatibility feature analyzes your and your partner’s data using Tarot, natal chart, and destiny matrix to reveal relationship dynamics and offer practical advice.

item6.question: What languages is Kaelis AI available in?
item6.answer: At launch Kaelis AI supports English, Ukrainian, and Russian. Spanish, French, and additional languages are planned.

quest_1.question: When you face a challenge, the first thing you do is...

answers.answer_a: Listen to an internal signal, where the 'knot' of energy is.
answers.answer_b: Break the task down into steps and take action.
answers.answer_c: Gather facts and analyze the causes.
answers.answer_d: Seek support or connect with loved ones.
answers.answer_e: Look for a creative way to turn it into an opportunity.
answers.answer_f: See who else this might help and how to be of service.

quest_2.question: What is your main guiding principle in life?

quest_3.question: How do you make important decisions?

answers.answer_b: The most direct path to the goal.
answers.answer_e: I visualize a picture and move towards it.
answers.answer_f: I check it against the benefit for others.

quest_4.question: When things are hard, what pulls you together?

quest_6.question: How do you perceive your mission?

answers.answer_e: To create forms for the world.
answers.answer_f: To be a conductor of meaning.
answers.answer_g: To expand the boundaries of the possible.

quest_7.question: Which phrase is closest to you?

answers.answer_a: "The world is a reflection of my energy."
answers.answer_g: "The path opens up before the one who walks."

mage.title: MAGE
mage.subtitle: The Archetype of Intuition and Quiet Strength
mage.affirmation: I hear myself clearly. I choose my steps confidently

inner.text_1: You belong to a rare type of person who perceives the world not only with the mind but with your entire being. Your perception is deeper than that of most people — you pick up on the atmosphere, details, subtexts, the energy of people and events, even when no one else notices any changes.
inner.text_2: Your main quality is clarity, which comes not through logic, but through direct inner knowing.
inner.text_3: You feel where the truth is and where there is noise. Where there is life, and where there is emptiness. What is important, and what is superfluous.
inner.text_4: Inside you lives the ability to navigate through chaos, as if through fog — without losing your inner footing. You see what is invisible to others: directions, meanings, sprouts of possibilities that have not even broken through to the surface yet.
inner.text_5: A Mage is not a wizard. This is a person for whom intuition is a real tool, not a coincidence.
inner.text_6: You can read a space, people, the dynamics of relationships, the atmosphere in a team, future trends — and turn this into decisions.
inner.text_7: You are the one who brings depth and clarity into the world.

inner.item_1: Subtle perception — you see beneath the surface of events.
inner.item_2: Intuition as a compass — you feel the right step even in uncertainty.
inner.item_3: Ability to transform — emotions, situations, yourself.
inner.item_4: Presence — people feel calmer around you.
inner.item_5: Meaning-making — you can connect the dots into a coherent picture.

inner.text_1: Even a strong quality can work against a person if the balance is disturbed.
inner.item_1: Retreating into mysticism instead of taking action.
inner.item_2: Waiting for a 'perfect sign' to start.
inner.item_5: Getting stuck in the inner world if the outer world seems too loud.

inner.text_1: You shine when you can combine: depth, people, and meanings.
inner.item_2: deep research (UX, interviews, analytics of human behavior)
inner.item_4: projects where you need to feel the atmosphere, scenario, dynamics
inner.item_5: roles where 'subtle vision' is important — product manager, creative, media projects
inner.text_2: But most importantly — the Mage thrives where there is space for an intuitive approach.

inner.text_1: If you see these symptoms — it's not a problem, but just a slight loss of center:
inner.item_6: difficulty with simple everyday decisions
inner.text_2: When this happens — a gentle return to yourself is needed.

warrior.title: WARRIOR
warrior.subtitle: The Archetype of Strength, Will, and Pure Directness
warrior.affirmation: I move confidently. I choose strength that supports, not exhausts

inner.text_1: You are a person of action.
inner.text_2: The one who can take a hit, pull yourself together in moments of chaos, make decisions when others are lost, and push through a path where it seems impossible to go further.
inner.text_3: Inside you is a rare combination:
inner.text_5: You are not one to hesitate for long.
inner.text_6: You feel the direction — and you go.
inner.text_7: You know that movement itself brings strength.
inner.text_8: You have a strong inner core:
inner.text_9: if you believe in something, if you choose something — you go all the way. That's why people feel safe around you.
inner.text_10: You know how to keep your word, keep the pace, hold the space.
inner.text_11: You are capable of changing reality through will, discipline, and determination.
inner.text_12: This is not 'toughness' — it is a calm, confident strength that cannot be faked.
inner.text_13: You were not born for stagnation.
inner.text_14: You need a vector, movement, dynamics.
inner.text_15: That is where you unfold most powerfully.

inner.item_1: ability to start and finish things
inner.item_6: ability to act under pressure
inner.text_1: You are the person others rely on.
'Strength without balance sometimes starts to press down instead of support.'
inner.item_5: burnout that you hide from everyone
inner.text_2: The Warrior's shadow always manifests in two things:
inner.text_3: "I'll handle it myself" and "I won't stop until I drop."
inner.text_4: But a true Warrior chooses strategy, not exhaustion.

inner.text_1: You are strong where will and systematic action are needed:
inner.item_4: any situation where deadlines and results matter
inner.item_6: creating complex structures, teams, processes
inner.text_2: You are the person who can guide a situation through any turbulence and see it through to the end.

inner.text_1: If you see this — it means you are tired and need not a feat, but a tune-up:
inner.item_4: internal tension, especially in the shoulders/neck
inner.item_6: feeling that no one else is 'pulling their weight'
inner.text_2: This is not weakness. It is a sign that you have been in battle for too long.

sage.title: SAGE
sage.subtitle: The Archetype of Understanding, Clarity, and Inner Logic
sage.affirmation: My understanding brings clarity, and my clarity leads to action

inner.text_1: You are a person who sees structure where others see chaos.
inner.text_2: You sense the causality of the world, notice patterns, read between the lines, and gather disparate facts into a single picture.
inner.text_3: For you, understanding is not boring rationality.
inner.text_4: Understanding is a way to feel the world as safe.
inner.text_5: When everything is clear, everything becomes simpler, softer, calmer.
inner.text_6: You possess a rare quality: the ability to think deeply, not for a long time.
inner.text_7: You can find the essence, connect logical dots, ask the right questions.
inner.text_8: Where others need dozens of attempts, you just need to look deeper — and everything falls into place.
inner.text_9: Your presence brings structure and order to the lives of others.
inner.text_10: You are the person people come to for understanding, for meaning, for that very advice that puts everything in order.

inner.item_3: ability to formulate complex things in simple words
inner.item_4: ability to understand people without judgment
inner.item_6: intelligence that does not pressure, but facilitates

inner.text_1: The Sage's shadow appears when the mind is tired, but the brain continues to 'work by inertia'.
inner.item_5: missing out on pleasure due to 'correctness'
inner.item_6: avoiding decisions until full understanding is reached
inner.text_2: Sometimes your mind becomes too loud — and drowns out your feeling part.

inner.text_1: You are strong where meaning and structure are needed:
inner.item_4: product roles where it's important to understand people
inner.item_5: working with big data, models, concepts
inner.item_6: deep reflection, intellectual creativity
inner.text_2: You are the person with whom all processes become clearer.

inner.text_1: If you see this in your day — your brain is overheated:
inner.item_2: desire to control everything through understanding
inner.item_3: loss of emotional contact with loved ones
inner.item_6: mild irritation from lack of system
inner.text_2: This is not a mistake. It's a signal that your brain needs rest, and your soul needs attention.

lover.title: LOVER
lover.subtitle: The Archetype of Warmth, Empathy, and Genuine Connection
lover.affirmation: I value others, but I don't forget about myself. My feelings also have a place

inner.text_1: You are a person who experiences the world primarily through relationships.
inner.text_2: You subtly read people's moods, their state, changes in voice, gestures, pace of speech. This is not magic — it's a high emotional intelligence that you have developed naturally.
inner.text_3: When you are near, it becomes easier to speak openly.
inner.text_4: You know how to be the kind of interlocutor with whom one doesn't have to pretend or 'keep up appearances'.
inner.text_5: Your presence creates a sense of sincerity and safety because you react in a lively, attentive, and human way.
inner.text_6: You are a person who sees value in intimacy, trust, honest conversations, and emotions.
inner.text_7: You know how to support in a way that actually makes a person feel better, not just 'as a formality'.
inner.text_8: You are not afraid to feel deeply — and that is precisely what makes you authentic.

inner.item_1: ability to subtly sense the emotional states of others
inner.item_2: ability to listen so that a person feels attention, not judgment
inner.item_6: natural warmth that calms, not pressures
inner.text_1: You are the person who makes relationships better.
Your sensitivity is a gift.
inner.text_2: But if the balance is disturbed, it turns into overload.
inner.item_2: attempt to 'maintain relationships' at any cost
inner.item_4: fear that you will upset someone
inner.item_6: tendency to take on others' emotions
inner.text_3: You are not obliged to be support all the time.
inner.text_4: Your own state is important too.

inner.text_1: Where humanity is important:
inner.item_5: creativity where emotional depth is important
inner.item_6: any field that requires trust and connection
inner.text_2: You are not just 'good with people'.
inner.text_3: You know how to build relationships that heal.

inner.text_1: If you see this — it means you have been giving too much:
inner.item_4: internal resentment that you keep silent about
inner.item_6: loss of contact with your own desires
inner.text_2: This is not a crisis — it's a need to take a little more care of yourself.

creator.title: CREATOR
creator.subtitle: The Archetype of Ideas, Self-Expression, and Inner Freedom
creator.affirmation: I create freely. What I do has value

inner.text_1: You are a person who sees what does not yet exist.
inner.text_2: Inside you, images, meanings, options, solutions, new approaches are constantly being born.
inner.text_3: You notice the unusual in the ordinary, connect the unconnectable, and create forms that are pleasant for others to look at, listen to, or step into.
inner.text_4: For you, creativity is not a hobby or the domain of artists.
inner.text_5: It is a way of thinking.
inner.text_6: A way to react to the world.
inner.text_8: You have a rare quality — inner freedom.
inner.text_9: Even if external conditions are difficult, your imagination continues to work, seeking new paths, new meanings, new forms of expression.
inner.text_10: You know how to get inspired, and then inspire.
inner.text_11: People feel around you a space where 'it is possible', not 'it is forbidden'.
inner.text_12: Where there is room for experiment, lightness, play, ideas.
inner.text_13: You are not just a person who comes up with ideas.
inner.text_14: You are a person who brings them to life.

inner.item_1: ability to see opportunities where others see limitations
inner.item_2: natural sense of beauty, form, style
inner.item_3: ability to unite ideas into a single concept
inner.item_4: high visual literacy, interest in new approaches
inner.item_6: ability to inspire others with your vision
inner.item_7: ability to come up with non-standard solutions
inner.text_1: Your strength is in freshness and originality.
When the Creator's energy runs wild, typical signs appear:
inner.item_6: procrastination under the guise of 'I'm waiting for inspiration'
inner.text_2: Sometimes your inner fire becomes too bright — and then it doesn't warm, but exhausts.

inner.text_1: Everything related to form, atmosphere, ideas, style:
inner.item_5: any field that requires originality and visual literacy
inner.item_6: creating new things — from services to art
inner.text_2: You bring any space you enter to life.

inner.text_1: You feel like you've fallen out of the flow if:
inner.item_1: you have ideas, but no energy to implement them
inner.item_5: a feeling that 'I'm not good enough' appears
inner.item_6: routine causes resistance
inner.text_2: This is not a failure.
inner.text_3: This is a creative burnout — and it recovers faster than it seems.

guide.title: GUIDE
guide.subtitle: The Archetype of Support, Mission, and Inner Light
guide.affirmation: I help others, but I don't forget about myself. My light is brighter when I am resourced

inner.text_1: You are a person who can see where someone needs help and act in a way that makes it easier for others.
inner.text_2: You have a naturally developed sense of responsibility, empathy, and moral orientation.
inner.text_3: You intuitively understand how to support, how to explain, how to guide — and you do it without pressure and without pomp.
inner.text_4: There are people who say smart things.
inner.text_6: But you belong to the rare category of those who can make the complex understandable and accessible.
inner.text_7: You bring clarity where people get lost.
inner.text_8: You know how to 'hold space' in difficult moments, without devaluing or rescuing — but precisely helping.
inner.text_9: You have a quiet inner strength that many feel but no one can accurately describe.
inner.text_10: This is not leadership through pressure.
inner.text_11: This is leadership through presence, wisdom, the ability to be a support.
inner.text_12: You are one of those who are trusted with the most important things.

inner.item_1: ability to explain complex things in simple language
inner.item_2: ability to notice when someone is feeling bad and help appropriately
inner.item_3: responsibility that does not weigh down
inner.item_6: ability to inspire, not push
inner.text_1: You are the person next to whom one can exhale.
When you take on too much, the following patterns appear:
inner.item_1: "I am responsible for everything and everyone"
inner.item_2: attempt to save people, even when not asked
inner.item_6: difficulty asking for help yourself
inner.text_2: A Guide becomes weak only in one case — when they forget that they are also human, not an endless resource.

inner.text_1: Where it is important to guide, explain, support:
inner.item_6: any field that requires meaning and clarity
inner.text_2: Your best environment is where people need someone who can lead without pressure.

inner.text_1: You may feel out of resources if:
inner.item_1: everyone around seems to 'hang' on you
inner.item_2: it's hard to stop and take care of yourself
inner.item_3: you get annoyed that you do a lot but receive little
inner.item_4: you start to covertly expect gratitude
inner.item_6: a feeling of inner emptiness arises
inner.text_2: This is not your fault.
inner.text_3: It is a sign that it's time to put yourself back on the priority list.

investigator.title: INVESTIGATOR
investigator.subtitle: The Archetype of Freedom, Novelty, and the Search for One's Path
investigator.affirmation: I am free to choose my path, and I know how to finish what is important to me

inner.text_1: You are a person who lives through movement.
inner.text_2: Not necessarily physical — sometimes it's the movement of thought, ideas, routes, a new perspective.
inner.text_3: It is important for you to feel that life continues, that horizons are open before you, that the world can be tasted.
inner.text_4: You perceive the world as a territory of opportunities.
inner.text_5: You know how to step into the new without fearing that 'it won't work out'.
inner.text_6: You are inspired by the process of search:
inner.text_9: what does the other option look like?
inner.text_10: You need air, space, freedom of choice, and the right to change direction.
inner.text_11: You don't get stuck because you internally feel: life is too big to walk the same route.
inner.text_12: Inner honesty is your main quality.
inner.text_13: If something is not for you — your body reacts first.
inner.text_14: You feel when it's time to change the environment, context, topic, or rhythm.
inner.text_15: And yes — it is you who brings inspiration, freshness, perspective, and unexpected solutions into the lives of others.

inner.item_1: flexibility and ability to adapt quickly
inner.item_4: ability to notice opportunities where others see limitations
inner.item_6: courage to try, make mistakes, learn
inner.item_7: ability to go beyond the familiar
inner.text_1: You are the person who expands the map of the world, your own and others'.
The Investigator's strength is movement.
inner.text_2: The shadow — when movement turns into flight.
inner.item_3: desire to bail when things get deep
inner.item_5: fear of commitments or loss of freedom
inner.item_6: difficulties with long-term goals
inner.text_3: Sometimes you feel that if you stop — you will lose yourself.
inner.text_4: But in reality, you only lose yourself when you stop listening to your own desires.

inner.text_1: Where it is necessary to open paths, look for unusual solutions, work at the intersection of disciplines:
inner.item_4: professions where speed of learning is important
inner.item_5: roles that require searching and testing hypotheses
inner.item_6: everything related to search, testing, experiments
inner.text_2: You are the person who brings fresh air into any system.

inner.text_1: When energy is scattered, the following markers appear:
inner.item_1: too many ideas, but none implemented
inner.item_3: desire to change everything at once
inner.item_6: unwillingness to go deep
inner.text_2: This is not a mistake — it's a sign that you need to reformat your route.
